metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6129 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** png_create_info_struct in png.c in libpng 1.6.36 has a memory leak, as demonstrated by pngcp. NOTE: a third party has stated "I don't think it is libpng's job to free this buffer."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream has disputed this CVE, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: libpng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
libpng1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
